item.title: Introducing vlDeploy - Deploy Applications With PowerShell Remotely
item.description: Managing applications on Windows in enterprises is complex and cumbersome. Admins are using a variety of tools to install, uninstall or reconfigure applications silently. The most popular tool is propably Microsoft’s ConfigMgr. While ConfigMgr (and others) makes sense for mid to large enterprises, the management is too time-consuming for smaller firms.
